name: InteractivePDFExportPreference
shortdesc: Interactive PDF export settings for the application object.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the InteractivePDFExportPreference &#40;a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: pageRange
property.shortdesc: The pages to print, specified either as an enumeration or a string. To specify a range, separate page numbers in the string with a hyphen &#40;-). To specify separate pages, separate page numbers in the string with a comma (,). Can return: PageRange enumerator or String.

property.name: exportReaderSpreads
property.shortdesc: If true, each spread in the exported document is combined into a single page that has spread's original width.

property.name: viewPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically opens the PDF file after exporting.

property.name: generateThumbnails
property.shortdesc: If true, generates thumbnail images for each page or spread.

property.name: exportLayers
property.shortdesc: If true, saves each layer as an Acrobat layer within the PDF document.

property.name: includeStructure
property.shortdesc: If true, creates a tagged PDF file. Note: If acrobat compatibility is acrobat 6 or higher, tags are visible only when the PDF is opened in Acrobat 6 or higher.

property.name: pdfMagnification
property.shortdesc: The export PDF magnification options.

property.name: pdfPageLayout
property.shortdesc: The export PDF page layout.

property.name: openInFullScreen
property.shortdesc: Open PDF in full screen mode.

property.name: flipPages
property.shortdesc: Automatically flip pages in the exported PDF.

property.name: flipPagesSpeed
property.shortdesc: The speed that the pages flip.

property.name: pageTransitionOverride
property.shortdesc: The name of the page transition to use for all pages.

property.name: interactivePDFInteractiveElementsOption
property.shortdesc: How to draw interactive elements.

property.name: pdfRasterCompression
property.shortdesc: The PDF raster compression options.

property.name: pdfJPEGQuality
property.shortdesc: The PDF JPEG quality options.

property.name: rasterResolution
property.shortdesc: The raster resolution. Can return: RasterResolutionOptions enumerator or Long Integer &#40;72 - 300).

property.name: usePDFStructureForTabOrder
property.shortdesc: Use tagged PDF structure for interactive elements tab order.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the InteractivePDFExportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
